resources.string: This app is here to help with all your meditation needs. From tips and tools to integrate meditation into your daily life to learning how to use the natural elements to balance yourself, tracking your progress, and daily inspirational messages and quotes to keep you going.
Get ready for a journey in discovering a whole new way to approach meditation and to finding peace of mind through the key principles of thoughtlessness and balance.
Please make sure to listen to the introductory recording before your first meditation and check out our terminology page for more detailed explanations of the vocabulary used.

Welcome to the beginning of a new experience in meditation. Soon you will discover the significance meditation can have in your daily life and how you can develop your understanding of relaxation in a new light.

During the led audio meditations, you will be introduced to your 7 subtle energy centers. They govern certain physical and emotional aspects of our being and it is our aim, through meditation, to keep them in balance.
Please begin by listening to the introductory recording and start to familiarise yourself with the terms and actions.
Learn to overcome negative emotions that bring you down.
These short guided meditations can be followed anytime in the day, at work, in public transport, in the park.
Positive affirmations and reaching a thoughtless meditative state will help bring some peace into your busy day.
Here you will learn how to bring yourself into balance using various techniques.
The elements are here to help
You will understand how the elements play a role in bringing us back into balance and how we can use them in our daily meditations.
Please begin by listening to the introductory recording which explains this section.
On this page, you will be able to track your meditation progress and rate the daily meditations.

The criteria for rating your meditations are 
	1) How thoughtless did you feel? 
	2) How peaceful do you feel? 
	3) How balanced do you feel?
The music provided here will help set the mood and atmosphere for a meditation session without guidance.
